scripts.build: git submodule update --init --recursive && pnpm recursive run build
scripts.dev: concurrently -n contracts,client -c cyan,magenta "cd packages/contracts && pnpm run dev" "cd packages/client && pnpm run dev"
scripts.dev:pty: run-pty % pnpm dev:browser % pnpm dev:node % pnpm dev:client % pnpm dev:contracts
scripts.mud:up: pnpm mud set-version --tag main && pnpm install
scripts.prepare: husky install && (forge --version || pnpm foundry:up) && pnpm --filter 'browser' run build
